mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (name, id_card, gender, age, birth_date, phone, address, marriage) VALUES (#{name}, #{idCard}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{birthDate}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{marriage})
mapper.update: UPDATE customer SET name = #{name}, id_card = #{idCard}, gender = #{gender}, age = #{age}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address}, marriage = #{marriage} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, id_card, gender, age, birth_date AS birthDate, phone, address, marriage FROM customer
